review: It will run netflix/hulu/etc. very well. Starts up quickly. Easy to navigate.Other than the above, it is basically just an advertising platform for amazon's prime content. If you are not a subscriber to netflix or any other streaming media the firestick will be worthless to you.I was really really excited to be able to play content from my phone to my TV however after several attempts I am still unable to get it to work.
author: Adam Killen
